title: FUNdraising
description:
Join the American Cancer Society’s fight against cancer!


At the American Cancer Society, we're on a mission to free the world from cancer. Until we do, we'll be funding and conducting research, sharing expert information, supporting patients, and spreading the word about prevention. All so you can live longer — and better.


The FUNdraising App


The American Cancer Society FUNdraising app puts the FUN in fundraising! It enables Relay For Life© and Making Strides Against Breast Cancer participants to easily register for events and accept donations on-the-go.


Use the FUNdraising app to:


Register for your local Relay For Life or Making Strides Against Breast Cancer events

Accept in-person credit card and check donations with state-of-the-art scanning technologies and bank-grade security features

Create a Facebook Fundraiser

Share your fundraiser directly to your social and professional contacts and networks

Solicit donations via PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Venmo

Send donation receipts and thank you notes

Create and update your personal event fundraising page

Track your personal, team, and event fundraising progress

Monitor your fundraising progress to goal

View your earned personal and team badges

Fundraise for the American Cancer Society Cancer Action Network (ACS CAN)


Note that you must be a registered participant of one of our events to use this app. Register for Relay For Life and Making Strides Against Breast Cancer directly from the app. Verified participants of ResearcHERS, Real Men Wear Pink, and DetermiNation events can also accept donations using the app.



Relay For Life


For more than 35 years, communities across the world have come together to honor and remember loved ones and take action for lifesaving change. Relayers fundraise for a future free from cancer. We’re asking you to join the movement and sign up to save lives. Visit RelayForLife.org for more information.




Making Strides Against Cancer


From large-scale traditional walks to unique local experiences and celebrations, the American Cancer Society's Making Strides Against Breast Cancer has united communities, companies, and individuals across the country in the fight to end breast cancer for more than two decades – and we have no intention of ever slowing down. Visit MakingStridesWalk.org for more information.

summary: Fundraise for the American Cancer Society
